      @RequestMapping("/compareUSCA") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> cmpUsCa(@RequestParam(name="genre",defaultValue="Rock") String genre)
      Route 5 /compareUSCA (Displays the statistics between the United States and Canada) Compare the total of events, the monthly average and the month with the most and the least events. It also displays events grouped by State.

      Returns:
